name: Life (rowanqueue)
description:
The year is 1991,  just two years before we knew the truth was out there. You're spending the summer as an intern at the Deep Space Listening Station  and have grown restless from the lack of extraterrestrial contact.  As you get closer to your wit's end something odd happens,  an unknown entity reaches out to you. Who are they? What do they want? Take a plunge into this textual time piece and enjoy the trip.

Written by Jon Poulter

Art by Ajali Harrison

Sound by Hobo Hoo

Programmed by Rowan Wood
